de.dhbwka.swe.utils.util

Class AppLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dhbwka.swe.utils.util.AppLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAppLogger

    public class AppLogger
extends Object
implements IAppLogger
    a utility class with constants and static methods managing the logging of errors, warnings, infos, and debug information

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static AppLogger getInstance()
        get the single instance of the AppLogger class
        Returns:
        the instance

      • setSeverity

        public void setSeverity(IAppLogger.Severity severity)
        Description copied from interface: IAppLogger
        set the severity for the output of messages. Possible values are :
        IAppLogger.Severity.DEBUG_LOW, IAppLogger.Severity.DEBUG, IAppLogger.Severity.INFO, IAppLogger.Severity.WARNING, or IAppLogger.Severity.ERROR All messages more 'important' than the given severity is printed. (using DEBUG_LOW, ALL messages are printed, using ERROR, only the errors are printed.
        Specified by:
        setSeverity in interface IAppLogger
        Parameters:
        severity - the severity of the messages that should be printed.

      • showClassInfos

        public void showClassInfos(boolean show)
        Description copied from interface: IAppLogger
        print information about involved classes. This happens for severity = IAppLogger.Severity.DEBUG or IAppLogger.Severity.DEBUG_LOW.
        Specified by:
        showClassInfos in interface IAppLogger
        Parameters:
        show - if true, show information about involved classes

      • error

        public void error(String msg)
        Description copied from interface: IAppLogger
        print an error message. The error message is always printed, If the severity is set to IAppLogger.Severity.ERROR, only the errors are printed.
        Specified by:
        error in interface IAppLogger
        Parameters:
        msg - the message

      • error

        public void error(Throwable th)
        Description copied from interface: IAppLogger
        print an error message for a given Throwable instance. The error message is always printed, If the severity is set to IAppLogger.Severity.ERROR, only the errors are printed.
        Specified by:
        error in interface IAppLogger
        Parameters:
        th - the throwable containing the message

      • info

        public void info(String msg)
        Description copied from interface: IAppLogger
        print an information message The information is only printed, if the severity is set to IAppLogger.Severity.DEBUG or IAppLogger.Severity.INFO If the severity is set to IAppLogger.Severity.INFO, only the warnings, errors and infos are printed.
        Specified by:
        info in interface IAppLogger
        Parameters:
        msg - the message

      • debug

        public void debug(String msg)
        Description copied from interface: IAppLogger
        print a debug message. The debug message is only printed, if the severity is set to IAppLogger.Severity.DEBUG
        Specified by:
        debug in interface IAppLogger
        Parameters:
        msg - the message

      • debugLow

        public void debugLow(String msg)
        Description copied from interface: IAppLogger
        print a lowest level debug message. The debug message is only printed, if the severity is set to IAppLogger.Severity.DEBUG_LOW
        Specified by:
        debugLow in interface IAppLogger
        Parameters:
        msg - the message

      • warning

        public void warning(String msg)
        Description copied from interface: IAppLogger
        print a warning message. The warning message is only printed, if the severity is set to IAppLogger.Severity.DEBUG, IAppLogger.Severity.INFO or IAppLogger.Severity.WARNING If the severity is set to IAppLogger.Severity.WARNING, only the warnings and errors are printed.
        Specified by:
        warning in interface IAppLogger
        Parameters:
        msg - the message

      • isDebugMode

        public boolean isDebugMode()
        Description copied from interface: IAppLogger
        Get the information whether the severity is set to IAppLogger.Severity.DEBUG or IAppLogger.Severity.DEBUG_LOW.
        Specified by:
        isDebugMode in interface IAppLogger
        Returns:
        true, if the severity is in debug mode

        Specified by:

      • log2File

        public boolean log2File(String fileName,
                        boolean append)
        Description copied from interface: IAppLogger
        indicate that the logging should be written to a file
        Specified by:
        log2File in interface IAppLogger
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the log file (may include the whole path). If fileName is null or fileName is empty, no logging is initialized.
        append - if true, the log data will be appended to the log file
        Returns:
        true, if the file could be opened, if false, no logging is initialized (no file name given or an error)

      • printStackTrace

        public void printStackTrace(String pattern)
        Description copied from interface: IAppLogger
        print stack trace explicitly only for classes match the given pattern.
        Specified by:
        printStackTrace in interface IAppLogger
        Parameters:
        pattern - the given pattern

      • getSeverity

        public IAppLogger.Severity getSeverity()
        Description copied from interface: IAppLogger
        Get the current severity flag.
        Specified by:
        getSeverity in interface IAppLogger
        Returns:
        the severity flag, may be one value of IAppLogger.Severity:
        IAppLogger.Severity.DEBUG_LOW, IAppLogger.Severity.DEBUG, IAppLogger.Severity.INFO, IAppLogger.Severity.WARNING, or IAppLogger.Severity.ERROR
